exceptions.exn: In environment fn : nat -> R -> R D : R -> Prop fn' : forall eps : posreal, eventually (fun n : nat => forall x : R, D x -> Rabs (fn n x - Lim_seq (fun n0 : nat => fn n0 x)) < eps) D' : R H : D D' Unable to unify "D D'" with "ex_finite_lim_seq (fun n : nat => fn n D')".

original: intros fn D H. unfold CVS_dom, CVU_dom in *. intros x Hx. apply H. intros eps. specialize (H eps). destruct H as [N H]. exists N. intros n y HN Hb. apply H in HN. apply HN.
